content: <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, I heard today is your birthday. So I'll get straight to the point—
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content: May each year bring you another day as joyous as this one!
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content: So, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, birthday star of the day, is there anything you need help with? I'm at your service!
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content: A more formal way to put would be to say, today is the anniversary of the day you came into the universe, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>!
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日-11蛮蛮_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
<size=64>Happy Birthday!!</size>
I've been planning since yesterday to make sure this is the first thing I'd say to you today!
